NG0504:1: bden pa'i lam zhugs zhi ba 'thob //
NG0504:5: bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa la //
NG0504:6: lus kyi bya ba gtso ba'i phyir //
NG0504:7: bya ba rgyud ces rgyal bas gsungs //
NG0504:8: theg pa sna tshogs gdul bya'i blo //
NG0504:9: sde snod ma mo'i tshogs rnams las //
NG0504:10: blo dman phal gyis rtogs bya'i phyir //
NG0504:11: bstan pa'i snying po rgyud 'di nyid //
NG0504:12: dgra bcom chos kyi spyan la gtad //
NG0504:13: gtsug lag khang skyong mchod byas nas //
NG0504:14: mi nub 'dzam bu gling du dar //
NG0504:15: de tshe lha dang lha ma yin //
NG0504:16: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten nas //
NG0504:17: lhag pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te //
NG0504:18: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod //
NG0504:19: mi mchog lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NG0504:20: rkang gnyis gtso bo chos kyi bdag / dam pa'i bde ba 'byung gnas la //
NG0504:21: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0504:22: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las /
NG0504:23: mtshan gtad rjes su yi rang phul ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ///
NG0504:24: / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thams cad kyi gzhi'i
NG0504:25: rgyud mchog rin chen spungs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
NG0504:26: so /// / u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam b+ha ba dang */
NG0504:27: zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ka ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NG0504:28: phyis u rgyan nyid kyis ma dag pa rnams rang 'gyur mdzad nas gsal bar byas pa'o ///
NG0504:30: rgyal bas lung bstan pad+ma bdag gis su //
NG0504:31: smon lam stobs kyis rgya nas bod du phyin //
NG0504:32: gtsug lag khang skyong mnga' bdag bsam pa bsgrubs //
NG0504:33: sangs rgyas bstan pa bod du dar rgyas byas //
NG0504:34: khyad par lnga brgya'i dus su bstan pa'i rtsas //
NG0504:35: sangs rgyas bstan pa spyi yi thun mong du //
NG0504:36: bya ba gzhi rgyud rin chen spungs pa 'di //
NG0504:37: yi ger bris nas rin chen gter du sbas //
